abstract: ABB, the Swiss power and engineering company, said on Wednesday that it has agreed to buy Ventyx, an American maker of software for energy companies, for $1 billion in cash.
snippet: ABB, the Swiss power and engineering company, said on Wednesday that it has agreed to buy Ventyx, an American maker of software for energy companies, for $1 billion in cash.
lead_paragraph: ABB, the Swiss power and engineering company, said on Wednesday that it had agreed to buy Ventyx, an American maker of software for energy companies, for $1 billion in cash.

headline.main: Switzerland’s ABB to Buy Ventyx for $1 Billion
